TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 向页分析器提供代码以便为控件属性赋值。

span.span: Provides code to the page parser for assigning property values on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类创建用于检索资源值时执行页的代码。The class creates code to retrieve resource values when the page is executed. 资源文件通常包含针对特定语言或区域性本地化的信息。A resource file typically contains information localized for a particular language or culture. 资源表达式形式`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`页内。A resource expression takes the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>` within the page. 冒号 （:） 前面的表达式的一部分指定的表达式生成器来使用，类型和冒号后面的部分表示的类名称和资源键。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression builder to use, and the part after the colon signifies the class name and resource key. 前面的表达式将从名为的文件中检索以下值`ClassKey.resx`:The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from a file named `ClassKey.resx`: ``` Hello! ``` 当页分析器遇到与表达式`Resources`前缀，它将创建的实例类。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `Resources` prefix, it creates an instance of the class. 类计算表达式的值或生成代码，以在页执行时返回该表达式的值。The class either evaluates the expression or generates code to return a value for the expression when the page is executed. 如果将编译的页中遇到这种表达式对象生成代码，从资源文件中检索指定的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified value from the resource file. 如果将编译的页中遇到这种表达式对象在分析页时从资源文件返回值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the resource file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索从资源文件的默认货币。The following code example retrieves the default currency from a resource file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此代码从名为的资源文件中读取以下值`Financial.resx`App_GlobalResources 目录中。This code reads the following value from a resource file named `Financial.resx` in the App_GlobalResources directory. ``` US dollars ```

span.span: The parsed expression contains the class name and resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 形式的表达式时调用此方法`<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>`使用非编译功能的页中遇到。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>` is encountered in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 从资源文件中的键/值对检索相应的值。It retrieves the appropriate value from a key/value pair in a resource file.

A that invokes a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 CodeDOM 创建期间调用此方法的页面或控件。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 返回对象的类型是和表示在页执行过程中检索资源值时要调用的方法。The object returned is of the type and represents the method to call when retrieving a resource value during page execution.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示表达式是否可在使用非编译功能的页中计算。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否方法已在类中实现。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必须实现表达式生成器的表达式计算中使用非编译功能的页中。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 在未编译页面中支持的资源值的计算，因此此属性始终返回`true`。 supports evaluation of resource values in non-compiled pages, so this property always returns `true`.
